column4: hi folks..  anyone know where I can find an iso for ubuntu 7.04 (preferrable the alternate ppc install iso, but I'm willing to give the desktop cd a try too)
please repeat what kind of mac?
I have 8.04 PPC running on a G4 iMac (the one that looks like a lamp)
8.04 will run fine, as far as I know.. the problem is with the open ati driver version 6.8
https://wiki.ubuntu.com/PowerPCFAQ - how to set things up
I'll give that a try, thanks.
make sure you change your repos to the mac ones
are they not already setup that way off of a ppc iso?
Did you get my last link regarding repos?
there's also a problem on install with the CD-rom - you have to modprobe in the install to get the CD working - its easy though
you get my last two posts?
